snippet: The shutdown increases the risk that the public will suffer from contaminated products.
abstract: Editorial warns that government shutdown has caused staff reductions at Food and Drug Administration and the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, increasing risk that the public will suffer from food-borne illnesses.
lead_paragraph: The shutdown increases the risk that the public will suffer from contaminated products.

headline.main: Rolling the Dice on Food-Borne Illnesses
headline.print_headline: Rolling the Dice on Food-Borne Illnesses

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations
